title: Adventure in the Enchanted Forest
storyDescription: Lily discovers a magical door in the forest that leads to a world full of mysterious creatures, but she must solve a riddle to find her way back home!
generatedStory:
Page 1:
Page 1: As Lily walked home from her first day of school, she spotted a strange door in the forest. It was shimmering and oddly inviting. With her magic hat on, she decided to see where it led.

Page 2:
Page 2: When Lily stepped through, she entered an Enchanted Forest. Everything sparkled, and delightful creatures greeted her. But one grumpy gnome told her, "To find your way home, solve the riddle: What has keys but can't open

Page 3:
doors?" Page 3: Lily thought hard. Suddenly, she remembered her music class. "A piano!", she exclaimed. The gnome smiled, and a door appeared. Lily stepped through and found herself back home, ready to share her magical adventure.
